articles.title: UPDATE 1-Argentina grains exchange cuts forecast for wheat-planting area
articles.description: (Adds quotes, more information about forecast)BUENOS AIRES, July 21 (Reuters) - Argentina's wheat-planting area for the 2022/2023 harvesting season is estimated at 6.1 million hectares (15.1 million acres), down from a previously estimated 6.2 million hectares, the Buenos Aires grains exchange said on Thursday.The revised forecast is the fifth cut that the exchange has made to

articles.title: Rugby-Argentina name squad for Rugby Championship clashes against Australia
articles.description: There are returns to the squad for tighthead prop Santiago Medrano, loose forward Joaquin Oviedo and centre Lucas Mensa, while second rower Guido Petti and winger Bautista Delguy are being rested for later clashes in the southern hemisphere championship against New Zealand and South Africa. Argentina host Australia in Mendoza on Aug. 6, and in San Juan on Aug. 13.
articles.content: Argentina have included captain Julian Montoya and the first-choice halfback pairing of Tomas Cubelli and Nicolas Sanchez in a 34-man squad for the two tests against Australia in the Rugby Championship, the Argentine Rugby Union said on Thursday. Coa... [2191 chars]

articles.title: Netflix expanding password-sharing crackdown with new test
articles.description: The feature will roll out for testing in Argentina, the Dominican Republic, Honduras, El Salvador, Guatemala on Aug. 22.
articles.content:
article
Netflix is expanding its efforts to crack down on password sharing with a new test in some Latin American countries.

articles.description: Zelenskyy last week requested to host the South America’s Mercosur trade bloc but members Argentina, Brazil, Uruguay and Paraguay failed to reach an agreement on his demand

articles.title: Paramount+ Taps 'Money Heist' Rodrigo de la Serna
articles.description: Argentina’s Rodrigo de la Serna leads Paramount+ original ‘El Salto de Papá,’ inspired by the memoir of Argentine Martin Sivak.
articles.content:
Argentina’s Rodrigo de la Serna leads the cast in the latest Paramount+ original film for Latin America, “El Salto de Papá,” based on the memoir of Argentine author-journalist Martin Sivak.

articles.title: Wallabies team to tour Argentina, squad, changes, selections
articles.description: Shock centre inclusions as Wallabies name squad for dates with Cheika’s Argentina
articles.content:
The absence of Samu Kerevi and injury to Izaia Perese has paved the way for centres Irae Simone and Lalakai Foketi to return for the Wallabies, as Dave Rennie named a 36-man squad for their two Tests against Michael Cheika’s Los Pumas in Argentina.

articles.title: Quevedo Scores First No. 1 on Argentina Hot 100 With Bizarrap
articles.description: The ‘Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 52’ leads in its second week.
articles.content:
Spanish rapper Quevedo captures his first No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart as “Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 52,” with Bizarrap, takes the lead on the July 16-dated ranking.
